entities.name: Policy
entities.description: The organizational policy document that provides staff with understanding and safe working environment

attributes.purpose: provide staff with clear understanding of policies, procedures and practices and a healthy, safe working environment

source_anchor.source_text: The purpose of this Policy is to provide the staff of the Personnel and Representatives with a clear understanding of the policies, procedures and practices used by the organization and a healthy, safe working environment for staff.

source_anchor.source_text: This document also provides an overview of how the Organization assesses, monitors and responds to security risks that may affect staff and program implementation.
